ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT(ISNEW()),ServiceResource.FSM_Contractor__c = False, NOT(ISPICKVAL(ServiceResource.ResourceType, 'C')),($Permission.FSM_ModifyContractorSkills ),OR( EffectiveStartDate <> PRIORVALUE(EffectiveStartDate), EffectiveEndDate <> PRIORVALUE(EffectiveEndDate), SkillLevel <> PRIORVALUE(SkillLevel) ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You are not allowed to assign or update the skill for an internal resource
